verses.verse: Again, the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3588>'When<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6381>makes<s%> a <S%H6381>difficult<s%> <S%H5088>vow,<s%> he [shall be valued] according to your <S%H6187>valuation<s%> of <S%H5315>persons<s%> belonging to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'If your <S%H6187>valuation<s%> is of the <S%H2145>male<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> even to <S%H8346>sixty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> then your <S%H6187>valuation<s%> shall be <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary.<s%>
'Or <S%H518>if<s%> it is a <S%H5347>female,<s%> then your <S%H6187>valuation<s%> shall be <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels.<s%>

'And <S%H518>if<s%> it be from <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> even to <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> then your <S%H6187>valuation<s%> for the <S%H2145>male<s%> shall be <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels,<s%> and for the <S%H5347>female<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H8255>shekels.<s%>

'But <S%H518>if<s%> [they are] from a <S%H2320>month<s%> even up to <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> then your <S%H6187>valuation<s%> shall be <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> for the <S%H2145>male,<s%> and for the <S%H5347>female<s%> your <S%H6187>valuation<s%> shall be <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>

'And <S%H518>if<s%> [they are] from <S%H8346>sixty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> it is a <S%H2145>male,<s%> then your <S%H6187>valuation<s%> shall be <S%H2568>fifteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8255>shekels,<s%> and for the <S%H5347>female<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H8255>shekels.<s%>

'But <S%H518>if<s%> he is <S%H4134>poorer<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> your <S%H6187>valuation,<s%> then he shall be <S%H5975>placed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H9437>value<s%> him; <S%H5921>according<s%> <S%H6310><s%> to the <S%H3027>means<s%> <S%H5381><s%> of the one who <S%H5087>vowed,<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H9437>value<s%> him.

'Now <S%H518>if<s%> it is an <S%H929>animal<s%> of the kind <S%H834>which<s%> men can <S%H7126>present<s%> as an <S%H7133>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H834>such<s%> that one <S%H5414>gives<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall be <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

'He shall not <S%H2498>replace<s%> it or <S%H4171>exchange<s%> it, a <S%H2896>good<s%> for a <S%H7451>bad,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H7451>bad<s%> for a <S%H2896>good;<s%> or <S%H518>if<s%> he <S%H4171>does<s%> <S%H4171>exchange<s%> <S%H929>animal<s%> for <S%H929>animal,<s%> then both it and its <S%H8545>substitute<s%> shall <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

<S%H518>'If,<s%> however, it is <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H929>animal<s%> of the kind <S%H834>which<s%> men do not <S%H7126>present<s%> as an <S%H7133>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> then he shall <S%H5975>place<s%> the <S%H929>animal<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3548>priest.<s%>

'And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H9437>value<s%> it as <S%H996>either<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H996>or<s%> <S%H7451>bad;<s%> as you, the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H6187>value<s%> it, <S%H3651>so<s%> it shall be.
'But <S%H518>if<s%> he should <S%H1350>ever<s%> [wish to] <S%H1350>redeem<s%> it, then he shall <S%H3254>add<s%> one-fifth of it to your <S%H6187>valuation.<s%>

'Now <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6942>consecrates<s%> his <S%H1004>house<s%> as <S%H6944>holy<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H9437>value<s%> it as <S%H996>either<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H996>or<s%> <S%H7451>bad;<s%> as the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H9437>values<s%> it, <S%H3651>so<s%> it shall <S%H6965>stand.<s%>

'Yet <S%H518>if<s%> the one who <S%H6942>consecrates<s%> it should [wish to] <S%H1350>redeem<s%> his <S%H1004>house,<s%> then he shall <S%H3254>add<s%> one-fifth of your <S%H6187>valuation<s%> <S%H3701>price<s%> to it, so that it may be his.

'Again, <S%H518>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6942>consecrates<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> part of the <S%H7704>fields<s%> of his own <S%H272>property,<s%> then your <S%H6187>valuation<s%> shall be <S%H6310>proportionate<s%> to the <S%H2233>seed<s%> needed for it: a <S%H9149>homer<s%> of <S%H8184>barley<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> at <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>
<S%H518>'If<s%> he <S%H6942>consecrates<s%> his <S%H7704>field<s%> as of the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3104>jubilee,<s%> according to your <S%H6187>valuation<s%> it shall <S%H6965>stand.<s%>

<S%H518>'If<s%> he <S%H6942>consecrates<s%> his <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3104>jubilee,<s%> however, then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H2803>calculate<s%> the <S%H3701>price<s%> for him <S%H6310>proportionate<s%> to the <S%H8141>years<s%> that are <S%H3498>left<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3104>jubilee;<s%> and it shall be <S%H1639>deducted<s%> from your <S%H6187>valuation.<s%>

'And <S%H518>if<s%> the one who <S%H6942>consecrates<s%> it should <S%H1350>ever<s%> wish to <S%H1350>redeem<s%> the <S%H7704>field,<s%> then he shall <S%H3254>add<s%> one-fifth of your <S%H6187>valuation<s%> <S%H3701>price<s%> to it, so that it may <S%H6965>pass<s%> to him.

'Yet <S%H518>if<s%> he will not <S%H1350>redeem<s%> the <S%H7704>field,<s%> but has <S%H4376>sold<s%> the <S%H7704>field<s%> to <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> it may <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> be <S%H1350>redeemed;<s%>

and when it <S%H3318>reverts<s%> in the <S%H3104>jubilee,<s%> the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> like a <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H9172>set<s%> <S%H9172>apart;<s%> it shall be for the <S%H3548>priest<s%> as his <S%H272>property.<s%>

'Or <S%H518>if<s%> he <S%H6942>consecrates<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> a <S%H7704>field<s%> which he has <S%H4736>bought,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is not a part of the <S%H7704>field<s%> of his own <S%H272>property,<s%>

then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H2803>calculate<s%> for him the <S%H4373>amount<s%> of your <S%H6187>valuation<s%> up to the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3104>jubilee;<s%> and he shall on that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> your <S%H6187>valuation<s%> as <S%H6944>holy<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'In the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3104>jubilee<s%> the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to the one from <S%H834>whom<s%> he <S%H7069>bought<s%> it, to <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> belongs.

<S%H3605>'Every<s%> <S%H6187>valuation<s%> of yours, moreover, shall be after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary.<s%> The <S%H8255>shekel<s%> shall be <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H1626>gerahs.<s%>

<S%H389>'However,<s%> a first-born among <S%H929>animals,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> as a first-born belongs to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> may <S%H6942>consecrate<s%> it; <S%H518>whether<s%> <S%H7794>ox<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> <S%H7716>sheep,<s%> it is the Lord's.

'But <S%H518>if<s%> [it is] among the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H929>animals,<s%> then he shall <S%H6299>redeem<s%> it according to your <S%H6187>valuation,<s%> and <S%H3254>add<s%> to it one-fifth of it; and <S%H518>if<s%> it is not <S%H1350>redeemed,<s%> then it shall be <S%H4376>sold<s%> according to your <S%H6187>valuation.<s%>

<S%H389>'Nevertheless,<s%> <S%H3605>anything<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2763>sets<s%> <S%H2763>apart<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> out of <S%H3605>all<s%> that he has, of <S%H120>man<s%> or <S%H929>animal<s%> or of the <S%H7704>fields<s%> of his own <S%H272>property,<s%> shall not be <S%H4376>sold<s%> or <S%H1350>redeemed.<s%> <S%H3605>Anything<s%> <S%H9172>devoted<s%> to <S%H2763>destruction<s%> is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H3808>'No<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3605>one<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> may have been <S%H2763>set<s%> <S%H2763>apart<s%> <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> shall be <S%H6299>ransomed;<s%> he shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

'Thus <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4643>tithe<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> of the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> or of the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H6086>tree,<s%> is the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s; it is <S%H6944>holy<s%> to the Lord.
<S%H518>'If,<s%> therefore, a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1350>wishes<s%> to <S%H1350>redeem<s%> part of his <S%H4643>tithe,<s%> he shall <S%H3254>add<s%> to it one-fifth of it.

'And for <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H4643>tenth<s%> <S%H4643>part<s%> of <S%H1241>herd<s%> or <S%H6629>flock,<s%> <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H5674>passes<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H7626>rod,<s%> the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> one shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'He is not to be <S%H1239>concerned<s%> <S%H996>whether<s%> [it is] <S%H2896>good<s%> or <S%H7451>bad,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> shall he <S%H4171>exchange<s%> it; or <S%H518>if<s%> he <S%H4171>does<s%> <S%H4171>exchange<s%> it, then both it and its <S%H8545>substitute<s%> shall <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H6944>holy.<s%> It shall not be <S%H1350>redeemed.<s%>' "

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> at <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai.<s%>
